m_szDocTitle: Patent US8557441 - Titania-graphene anode electrode paper - Google Patents
m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- Abstract A method for forming a nanocomposite material, the nanocomposite material formed thereby, and a battery made using the nanocomposite material. Metal oxide and graphene are placed in a solvent to form a suspension. The suspension is then applied to a current collector. The solvent is then evaporated to form a nanocomposite material. The nanocomposite material is then electrochemically cycled to form a nanocomposite material of at least one metal oxide in electrical communication with at least one graphene layer.  Images(6)        Claims(16) The inventio
